features.name: Nedbank Greenback Rewards
features.shortDescription: By joining our Greenbacks Rewards Programme you will earn rewards when you use your credit card or one of our other transactional accounts.

features.name: Nedbank Greenbacks Shop Card
features.description: Great news! We've made it quick and easy to redeem all the Greenbacks you've earned with your very own SHOP card

features.name: Affinity Rewards
features.shortDescription: Through our programmes you can support the arts, environmental conservation initiatives or sports or help needy children, at no cost to you. You choose the affinity programme you'd like to support.
